basic_information.scholarship_name: Eley Fister Schaul Endowed Scholarship in Library Media Specialist
basic_information.committee_name: CEPS - Eley Fister Schaul Endowed Scholarship in L

description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to the graduate students within the College of Education & Professional Studies pursuing a Masters of Education degree in Instructional Media/Library Media Education. Eligibility Requirements This scholarship is open to any graduate student majoring in Instructional Media/Library Media Education Must have a minimum 3.5 GPA Must be a U.S. Citizen Resident of Oklahoma preferred Must demonstrate financial need Selection Process Recipients of the scholarship will be selected by a departmental committee Award Requirements Must be enrolled in the upcoming fall and spring semester to receive award Attendance at an awards banquet is required for all recipients Recipients must write a thank you letter to the donors of the scholarship

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
